name: Sum of N Numbers
description:
Write a program to calculate the sum of the first N numbers. 
Ex: input=5 =>5+4+3+2+1 =15
output=15

name: Factorial of a Number
description:
Write a program to compute the factorial of a given number. 
 Ex: input= 5  =>5x4x3x2x1 
 output=120

name: Armstrong number
description:
Write a C program to check whether a number 
is Armstrong number or not A number is Armstrong number 
if the sum of the digit to the power of 
number of digits is equal to the original number

name: Ascending Order
description:
Write a C program to print 3 values 
in ascending order using ladder 
if..else

name: Categorize Age
description:
Write a C program to categorize a 
person's age using ladder if..else  
0-12: Child
13-19: Teenager
20-35: Young Adult
36-55: Middle Aged
56-100: Senior
else: Invalid

name: Automorphic Number
description:
automorphic number or not
A number is called an automorphic number if and only if 
the square of the given number ends with the same number 
itself. For example, 25, 76 are automorphic numbers because 
their square is 625 and 5776, respectively and the last two 
digits of the square represent the number itself. Some other 
automorphic numbers are 5, 6, 36, 890625, etc.

name: Automorphics in range
description:
C program to print automorphic numbers 
between 1 and a given value(25->625) 
Sample Input and Output  
input=1000 
output=1 5 6 25 76 376 625
input=10000
output=1 5 6 25 76 376 625 9376

name: Binary to Decimal
description: convert a given binary value to decimal

name: Classification of Character
description:
Write a C program that takes a character 
as input andclassifies it as:
Vowel
Consonant
Digit
Special Character
 
input=I
output=Vowel
input=u
output=Vowel
input=k
output=Consonant
input=3
output=Digit
input=%
output=Special Character
input=P
output=Consonant
input=q
output=Consonant

name: Character Classification
description:
Character Classification: Write a C program that takes a character as input and classifies it as:
Uppercase letter
Lowercase letter
Digit
Special character (anything else)
input=Z
output=uppercase
input=9
output=digit
input=m
output=lowercase

name: Classify Number
description:
Write a C program that takes an integer as input and uses
nested if-else statements to classify the number as:
Positive Even
Positive Odd
Negative Even
Negative Odd
Zero
input=15
output=Positive Odd
 input=-20
output=Negative Even
input=-33
output=Negative Odd
input=444
output=Positive Even
input=0
output=Zero

name: Color Name
description:
Write a C Program to print colorname based 
on a given input value 
1-red
2-blue
3-green
4-yellow
5-pink
otherwise- black
input=-3
output=black
input=100
output=black
input=5
output=pink

name: Count the Digits
description:
Write a C program to count the digits of a given 
positive number
input=5555
output=Number of digits is 4
input=321
output=Number of digits is 3

name: Count The Number of Factors
description:
C program to count the number of factors
of a given value
Sample Input and Output
input=8
output=Number of factors is 4
input=9
output=Number of factors is 3

name: Disarium Number
description:
disarium number or not
1^1 + 7^2 + 5^3 = 1 + 49 + 125 = 175
175 is a disarium number
